This perspective article aims to examine the role of waste and wastewater management within the global response to COVID-19. It especially seeks to place lessons from previous epidemics and pandemics in the current context to construct a policy and research road map for the waste and wastewater sectors to join the fight against COVID-19 and future outbreaks of this nature.
